author: manunlp
content:
<@425907307621122049> , I get these errors:
```
[2024-07-11 15:55:05]  WARN initial-sync: Could not request data columns by range from peer error=failed to negotiate protocol: protocols not supported: [/eth2/beacon_chain/req/data_column_sidecars_by_range/1/ssz_snappy] peer=16Uiu2HAkyPDz7yTJ8ZNbWxYyCAdgf7h9dU6tQCgG7iEZ8eguxjRi
[2024-07-11 15:55:46]  WARN initial-sync: Could not request data columns by range from peer error=failed to negotiate protocol: protocols not supported: [/eth2/beacon_chain/req/data_column_sidecars_by_range/1/ssz_snappy] peer=16Uiu2HAmTbBLnGaWD4CedKH8K1Ab5wzpZdBYfJw9g47En83tTmC4
```

According to https://bootnode-1.peerdas-devnet-1.ethpandaops.io/meta/api/v1/inventory.json, 
- `16Uiu2HAkyPDz7yTJ8ZNbWxYyCAdgf7h9dU6tQCgG7iEZ8eguxjRi`
- `16Uiu2HAmTbBLnGaWD4CedKH8K1Ab5wzpZdBYfJw9g47En83tTmC4`

are Teku nodes.

Is this expected?

author: dmitriishmatko
content: yeah, we have not redeployed it with fix

author: dmitriishmatko
content:
only interop with
```
  - cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:nashatyrev-das
```
will work for now
